topicTitle: Can you tell i love you guys? :D

posts.postText:

Ben?

(And I'll need Mortos's steamid for adding him when TTT is back up :))

The portal donation sends it to Ben, not me. I can't use any donations sent to Ben, he has to get on and send your donation to me to confirm it.

(The donation thread is there for a reason)
>.> shoulda read that, but I'm at work and really should be working. :p I promise it's there. In all ten of its USD glory.
As said already, I can't get it, since Ben is away. I'll have to wait for Ben to get back to check it.
No worries about the time, sorry I did it wrong. Mortos's id: 0:0:33335842
